title: zephin
author: zephin
created_time: April 02, 2023, 12:15:26 PMLast edit: April 02, 2023, 12:55:07 PM by zephin
content: Can someone lend me 0.004 BTC, I will pay double back in the next 7 days. I need 0.004 BTC as my wallet won't let me transfer unless I deposit 0.004 from another wallet but I am unable to create a second wallet.

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Sounds like you are free trying scammed.Hearing things like must deposit to be able to withdraw/send is in 99% a scam and we have seen this heat often enough to call it right away.Also without any reputation or collateral nobody will give you anything, sorry but thatâ€™s simply the truth. 1 more thing, registering and 2min later ask for a loan is pretty much a nogo in any forum.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: zephin on April 02, 2023, 12:15:26 PMCan someone lend me 0.004 BTC, I will pay double back in the next 7 days. Trust is the most important factor in any lending situation, especially in a forum like this where there are no guarantees. It is essential to establish yourself as a reliable and trustworthy member of the community before you even think about asking for a loan. Remember, lenders on this forum are taking a risk by offering non collateral loans, so it is important to show them that you are a trustworthy borrower.Quote from: zephin on April 02, 2023, 12:15:26 PMI need 0.004 BTC as my wallet won't let me transfer unless I deposit 0.004 from another wallet but I am unable to create a second wallet.That sounds like an outright scam. How can you be certain that you will be able to withdraw funds from that wallet, even if you deposit 0.004 BTC from another wallet? What sort of service operates in this way?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: zephin on April 02, 2023, 12:15:26 PMCan someone lend me 0.004 BTC, I will pay double back in the next 7 days. I need 0.004 BTC as my wallet won't let me transfer unless I deposit 0.004 from another wallet but I am unable to create a second wallet.Would you mind naming or telling us the wallet it==or website that requires you to deposit 0.004 more BTC in order for you to transfer the rest of the BTCMost of such services are scams and once you send the more BTC, they won't release the rest of it as well.
